Toni Morrison won the Nobel Prize in Lit: Did Toni Morrison win the Nobel Prize in Literature in 1993? Toni Morrison Nobel Prize 1993
In 1993, author Toni Morrison becomes first Black American to win the Nobel Prize for Literature for her novel “Beloved”.
Did Toni Morrison win the Nobel Prize in Literature in 1993? Toni Morrison Nobel Prize 1993

The 1993 Nobel Prize in Literature was awarded to the African-American novelist Toni Morrison (1931–2019) "who in novels characterized by visionary force and poetic import, gives life to an essential aspect of American reality." Morrison was awarded before the third novel of the Beloved Trilogy was published.
